name: Oru Kayaks Pack
description: Take your Oru Kayak anywhere. Pack it up, put it in this backpack, and hike it to secret lakes or check it as luggage for other-side-of-the-pond paddling adventures. With comfortable shoulder and hip straps and space to carry your paddle and PFD, this pack gives you serious options. The only limitation to your paddling destinations is your imagination.Made of rugged heavy-duty nylon to protect your kayak in transport.Padded hipbelt and shoulder straps.Top and side grab handles.Extra-long durable zipper for easy access to the main compartment.Exterior mesh pockets hold a 2-piece paddle.Compression straps let you lash on extra gear and your PFD.Compatible with Oru Kayak Beach LT, Bay ST and Coast XT kayaks only. Not compatible with the Haven Tandem Kayak.
